markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Rock-Braced](/Equipment.aspx?ID=527)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Saggorak" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=269" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City](/Sources.aspx?ID=13) pg. 75</row>

**Price** 3,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto medium or heavy armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_Rock-braced_ armor makes you as hard to move as a boulder. Whenever another creature attempts to forcibly move you from your space, you gain a +4 item bonus to your Fortitude DC against the check to move you. If the creature would not normally need to attempt a check to move you, then the creature must succeed at an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check against your Fortitude DC (including the +4 item bonus) or you are unmoved.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Rock-Braced
